org.kr.dl.dig.reasoner.v1_1.impl
Class HTTPReasoner

java.lang.Object
  org.kr.dl.dig.reasoner.v1_1.impl.HTTPReasoner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reasoner
public class HTTPReasoner
extends Object
implements Reasoner

An implementation of Reasonerthat passes its requests to a remote reasoner via HTTP POST requests (see the DIG specification for more details). Allows the use of external reasoners conforming to the DIG interface, such as RACER .

Version:
$Id: HTTPReasoner.html,v 1.1 2009/10/26 12:39:38 evka Exp $
Author:
Daniele Turi
